text: Svetlana Vladimirovna Medvedeva (, ; née Linnik, ; born 15 March 1965) is a Russian economist. She was the First Lady of Russia from 2008 to 2012. She is married to the former prime minister and president, Dmitry Medvedev.5 фактов о Светлане Медведевой Биография С. Медведевой на личном сайте мужа 1 September 2009. ==References== Category:1965 births Category:Living people Category:First Ladies of Russia Category:Russian economists Category:People from Saint Petersburg
title: Svetlana Medvedeva
